# Dev Workflow Orchestrator Command

Orchestrate PRD creation, task generation, and gated task processing with user confirmations between phases..

## Usage

```
/dev-workflow-orchestrator
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `dev-workflow-orchestrator` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.
